snippet: That Tommy Caldwell would spend a decade trying to figure out how to free climb El Capitan’s Dawn Wall came as no surprise to those who know him as an untiring goal-setter.
abstract: Tommy Caldwell, who along with his climbing partner Kevin Jorgeson is attempting to free climb El Capitan's Dawn Wall in Yosemite National Park, has throughout his lifetime embraced risk and set lofty goals for himself; significant events in Caldwell's life include escaping militants in Kyrgyzstan and severing his left index finger; Caldwell has completed Pitch 16 of wall, trickiest section of climb thought by some to be hardest in world.
lead_paragraph: That Tommy Caldwell would spend a decade trying to figure out how to free climb El Capitan’s Dawn Wall came as no surprise to those who know him as an untiring goal-setter.

headline.seo: On El Capitan and Beyond, Tommy Caldwell’s Drive Pushes Him Toward the Impossible
headline.main: Abduction. Lost Finger. Now, a Rock Climber’s Tallest Hurdle.
headline.print_headline: Abduction. Lost Finger. Now, the Tallest Hurdle.
